Windlord :

Windlord felt terrible!

"I'm sure little one... That nobody there has a fox beast 
mode... "said while he huged her"I guess that your mommy miss you 
too "

And looking to Blackfang he said "I guess that she needs training... 
Do you like train her??? she needs a fellow canine rather than a 
bird"
